titleStmt.title: Some queries to the Protestants concerning the English Reformation, by J.W. Gent. Published with allowance
Considerations which obliged Peter Manby Dean of Derry to embrace the Catholique religion. Selections.
titleStmt.author: Manby, Peter, d. 1697.
Ward, Thomas, 1652-1708.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Nathaniel Thompson at the entrance into the Old Spring-Garden near Charing-Cross,

notesStmt.note: A translation of the Latin questions at the end of: Manby, Peter. The considerations which obliged Peter Manby Dean of Derry to embrace the Catholique religion.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
